author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'Bad Plan' Teaser Trailer for The Fantastic Four: First Steps, the next installment and the introduction of Marvel's First Family to the MCU, distributed by Marvel Studios. Get a look at more shots, including an intense chase scene through the cosmos with The Fantastic Four and the Silver Surfer. The Fantastic Four: First Steps is relasing in theaters on July 25.

The Fantastic Four: First Steps stars Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby, Joseph Quinn, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ralph Ineson, and Julia Garner. The Fantastic Four: First Steps opens in theaters on July 25, 2025.

Set against the vibrant backdrop of a 1960s-inspired, retro- futuristic world, Marvel Studios’ The Fantastic Four: First Steps introduces Marvel’s First Family—Reed Richards/Mister Fantastic (Pedro Pascal), Sue Storm/Invisible Woman (Vanessa Kirby), Johnny Storm/Human Torch (Joseph Quinn) and Ben Grimm/The Thing (Ebon Moss-Bachrach) as they face their most daunting challenge yet. Forced to balance their roles as
title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps - Official 'Bad Plan' Teaser (2025) Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby

author: IGN
description:
Death Stranding 2 VR training is a great way to learn everything you need to know to sneak, fight, and deliver orders. In the Porter Mastery Program, you will learn the basics of shooting, fighting with cargo, throwing grenades, sneaking past guards, and defeating BTs. You can also compete with other crew members on the DHV Magellan. In this video, we show you how to get the top score and s-rank every VR mission in the Porter Mastery Program.

00:00 - 1. Destroy All Targets
02:09 - 2. Destroy All Targets
03:52 - 3. Recover and Deliver All Cargo I
05:28 - 4. Neutralize All Bandits
08:02 - 5. Safely Deliver All Cargo Through Enemy Territory
10:35 - 6. Defeat All Brigands
12:54 - 7. Use the Blood Boomerang to Defeat All Enemies
14:23 - 8. Recover and Deliver All Cargo II
15:57 - 9. Recover and Deliver All Cargo III
18:49 - 10. Defeat All Ghost Mechs
22:00 - 11. Defeat 10 Enemies with Your Bare Hands
23:36 - 12. Defeat 20 Enemies with Your Bare Hands
26:29 - 13. Defeat 30 Enemies with You
title: Death Stranding 2 - All VR Missions S Ranked | Porter Mastery Program

author: IGN
description:
Death Stranding 2 VR training is a great way to learn everything you need to know to sneak, fight, and deliver orders. In the Porter Fundamentals Program you will learn the basics of shooting, fighting with cargo, throwing grenades, sneaking past guards, and defeating BTs. There are even some top secret techniques.
